CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Blunder Shot
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Things shoved down a barrel to get propelled out of.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Large Cannon Ball
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A large ball with the sole purpose of hitting the ground so hard that it causes shrapnel.
